analyzed: ekissāya iva kumbhiyā paccamānam odanam apākam addasa apākam ti vicāretvā vibhajitvā

original: ṭhapitaṃ viya tīhākārehi paccamānaṃ ekasmiṃ passe atikilinno hoti, ekasmiṃ uttaṇḍulo,

original: ekasmiṃ supakkoti. Ayaṃ dasamo supino.
analyzed: ekasmin su pakko ti ayam dasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 11. Satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇante addasa. Ayaṃ ekādasamo supino.
analyzed: sata sahassa gghanakam candana sāram pūti takkena vikkiṇante addasa ayam ekādasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 12. Tucchalābūni udake sīdantāni addasa. Ayaṃ dvādasamo supino.
analyzed: tuccha lābūni udake sīdantāni addasa ayam dvādasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 13. Mahantamahantā kūṭāgārappamāṇā ghanasilā nāvā viya udake plavamānā addasa. Ayaṃ terasamo supino.
analyzed: mahanta mahantā kūṭāgāra ppamāṇā ghana silā nāvā viya udake plavamānā addasa ayam terasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 14. Khuddakamadhukapupphappamāṇā maṇḍūkiyo mahante kaṇhasappe vegena anubandhitvā uppalanāḷe viya chinditvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gilantiyo addasa. Ayaṃ cuddasamo supino.
analyzed: khuddaka madhuka puppha ppamāṇāḥ maṇḍūkiyaḥ mahante kaṇha sappe vegena anubandhitvā uppala nāḷe viya chinditvā maṃsam khāditvā gilantiyaḥ addasa ayam cuddasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 15. Dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgataṃ gāmagocaraṃ kākaṃ kañcanavaṇṇavaṇṇatāya “suvaṇṇā”ti laddhanāme suvaṇṇarājahaṃse parivārente addasa. Ayaṃ pannarasamo supino.
analyzed: dasahi asat dhammehi samannāgatam gām agocaram kākam kañcana vaṇṇa vaṇṇa tāya suvaṇṇā ati laddha nāme suvaṇṇa rājahaṃse parivārente addasa ayam pannarasamaḥ supinaḥ

original: 16. Pubbe dīpino eḷake khādanti. Te pana eḷake dīpino anubandhitvā muramurāti khādante
analyzed: pubbe dīpinaḥ eḷake khādanti te pana eḷake dīpinaḥ anubandhitvā muramurāti khādante

analyzed: addasa athaññe tasāḥ vakāḥ eḷake dūratas iva disvā tasitā tāsa pattā hutvā eḷakānam bhayā

original: palāyitvā gumbagahanāni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu. Ayaṃ soḷasamo supino.
analyzed: palāyitvā gumba gahanāni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu ayam soḷasamaḥ supinaḥ

analyzed: lokassa parihīna kāle manussānam paritta āyuka kāle sattā tibba rāgāḥ bhavissanti

original: Ayaṃ dutiyassa vipāko.
analyzed: ayam dutiyassa vipākaḥ

original: Ayaṃ tatiyassa vipāko.
analyzed: ayam tatiyassa vipākaḥ

analyzed: gacchante gacchante kāle loko parihāyissati raṭṭham nirojam bhavissati rājāno

analyzed: parimajjati parimajjati

original: Dibbāya sotadhātuyāti ettha dibbasadisattā dibbā. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattā

analyzed: sadde suṇāti katame dve dibbe ca mānuse ca devānam ca manussānam ca sadde iti vuttam

analyzed: nippadesa pariyādānam veditabbam

analyzed: veneyya vasena pana desanā vilāsena ca byañjana nānattam katam cetasā

analyzed: kusala abyākata cittam vīta dosam sesāni dasa akusala cittāni imasmin duke saṅgaham na

analyzed: saṃvaṭṭaḥ saṃvaṭṭa ṭṭhāyī vivaṭṭaḥ vivaṭṭa ṭṭhāyī iti vuttāni tāni pariggahitāni honti

original: Amutrāsinti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gahiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā

analyzed: sa āmisa nirāmisa ādi ppabhedānam sukha dukkhānam paṭisaṃvedī evam āyu pariyantaḥ ti evam vassa sata parimāṇa āyu pariyantaḥ

original: vā caturāsītikappasahassāyupariyanto vā. So tato cuto amutra udapādinti so ahaṃ tato

analyzed: nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sakka nikāye vā udapādim tatra apāsinti

original: Evaṃnāmotiādi vuttanayameva.
analyzed: evaṃnāmā iti ādi vutta nayam eva

original: uppattiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “amutra udapādi”nti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tatrāpāsinti
analyzed: uppatti ṭṭhānam sandhāya amutra udapādin ti idam vuttan ti veditabbam tatra apāsin ti

original: evamādi panassa tatrāpi imissā upapattiyā antare upapattiṭṭhāne nāmagottādīnaṃ anussaraṇadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: evamādi panassa tatra api imissā upapattiyāḥ antare upapatti ṭṭhāne nāma gotta ādīnam anussaraṇa dassana attham

original: vuttaṃ. So tato cuto idhūpapannoti svāhaṃ tato anantaruppattiṭṭhānato cuto idha amukasmiṃ
analyzed: vuttam saḥ tatas cutaḥ idha upapannaḥ ti svāham tatas anantara uppatti ṭṭhānato cutaḥ idha amukasmin

original: nāma khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattoti. Itīti evaṃ. Sākāraṃ sauddesanti
analyzed: nāma khattiya kule vā brāhmaṇa kule vā nibbatto ti iti iti evam sa ākāram sa uddesanti

original: nāmagottavasena sauddesaṃ, vaṇṇādivasena sākāraṃ. Nāmagottena hi satto “tisso kassapo”ti
analyzed: nāma gotta vasena sa uddesam vaṇṇa ādi vasena sa ākāram nāma gottena hi satto tisso kassapo ti

original: uddisīyati, vaṇṇādīhi “sāmo odāto”ti nānattato paññāyati, tasmā nāmagottaṃ uddeso, itare ākārā.
analyzed: uddisīyati vaṇṇa ādīhi sāmaḥ odāto ti nānattataḥ paññāyati tasmā nāmagottam uddesaḥ itare ākārā

original: Dibbenātiādīsu dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi
analyzed: dibbena ati ādīsu dibba sadisa ttā dibbam devatānam hi su carita kamma nibbattam pitta semha ruhira ādīhi

original: apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu
analyzed: apalibuddham upakkilesa vimutta tāya dūre pi ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samattham dibbam pasāda cakkhu

original: hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalena nibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā
analyzed: hoti idam ca api vīriya bhāvanā balena nibbattam ñāṇa cakkhu tādisam eva ati dibba sadisa ttā

original: dibbaṃ. Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attano ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ.
analyzed: dibbam dibba vihāra vasena paṭiladdha ttā attano ca dibba vihāra sannissita ttā api dibbam

original: Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbaṃ. Tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena mahāgatikattāpi
analyzed: āloka pariggahena mahājutika ttā api dibbam tirokuṭṭa ādi gata rūpa dassanena mahāgatika ttā api

original: dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. Cakkhukiccakaraṇena
analyzed: dibbam tam sabbam sadda sattha anusārena veditabbam dassana ṭṭhena cakkhu cakkhu kicca karaṇena

original: cakkhumivātipi cakkhu. Cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddhaṃ. Yo hi
analyzed: cakkhum iva ati pi cakkhu cutūpapāta dassanena diṭṭhi visuddhi hetuttā visuddham yaḥ hi

original: cutimeva passati, na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo upapātameva passati,
analyzed: cutim eva passati na upapātam so uccheda diṭṭhim gaṇhāti yaḥ upapātam eva passati

original: na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati, so yasmā
analyzed: na cutim saḥ nava satta pātubhāva diṭṭhim gaṇhāti yaḥ pana tat ubhayam passati saḥ yasmā

original: duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati, tasmā taṃ dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu hoti.
analyzed: duvidham pi tam diṭṭhi gatam ativattati tasmā tam dassanam diṭṭhi visuddhi hetu hoti

original: Ubhayampi cetaṃ buddhaputtā passanti. Tena vuttaṃ “cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā
analyzed: ubhayam pi ca itam buddha puttā passanti tena vuttam cutūpapāta dassanena diṭṭhi visuddhi hetu ttā

original: visuddha”nti. Manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena atikkantamānusakaṃ, mānusaṃ
analyzed: visuddham ti manussu upacāram atikkamitvā rūpa dassanena atikkanta mānusakam mānusam

original: vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ. Tena dibbena cakkhunā
analyzed: vā maṃsa cakkhum atikkanta ttā atikkanta mānusakam ti veditabbam tena dibbena cakkhunā

original: visuddhena atikkantamānusakena.
analyzed: visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena

original: Satte passatīti manussānaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte oloketi. Cavamāne upapajjamāneti
analyzed: satte passati iti manussānam maṃsa cakkhunā viya satte oloketi cavamāne upapajjamāne iti

original: ettha cutikkhaṇe vā upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā. Ye pana āsannacutikā
analyzed: ettha cuti khaṇe vā upapatti khaṇe vā dibba cakkhunā daṭṭhum na sakkā ye pana āsanna cutikā

original: idāni cavissanti, te cavamānāti, ye ca gahitappaṭisandhikā sampatinibbattā ca, te
analyzed: idāni cavissanti te cavamānā ati ye ca gahita paṭisandhikā sampatinibbattā ca te

original: upapajjamānāti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne ca passatīti dasseti.
analyzed: upapajjamānā ati adhippetā te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne ca passati iti dasseti

original: Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite uññāte. Paṇīteti
analyzed: hīna iti moha nissanda yutta ttā hīnānam jāti kula bhoga ādīnam vasena hīḷite uññāte paṇīta iti

original: amohanissandayuttattā tabbiparīte. Suvaṇṇeti adosanissandayuttattā iṭṭhakantamanāpavaṇṇayutte.
analyzed: a moha nissanda yutta ttā tad biparīte suvaṇṇā iti a dosa nissanda yutta ttā iṭṭha kanta manāpa vaṇṇa yutte

original: Dubbaṇṇeti dosanissandayuttattā aniṭṭhākantāmanāpavaṇṇayutte, virūpavirūpetipi attho.
analyzed: dubbaṇṇā iti dosa nissanda yutta ttā aniṭṭhā kantā manāpa vaṇṇa yutte virūpa virūpā iti pi atthaḥ

original: Sugateti sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane. Duggateti duggatigate,
analyzed: sugata iti sugati gate alobha nissanda yutta ttā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane duggata iti duggati gate

original: lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne.
analyzed: lobha nissanda yutta ttā vā dalidde appanna pāne

original: Yathākammūpageti yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ, tena tena upagate. Kāyaduccaritenātiādīsu
analyzed: yathākammūpagā iti yam yam kammam upacitam tena tena upagate kāya duccaritena ati ādīsu

original: duṭṭhu caritaṃ kilesapūtikattāti duccaritaṃ. Kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ
analyzed: duṭṭhu caritam kilesa pūtikattā ati duccaritam kāyena duccaritam kāyataḥ vā uppannam

original: duccaritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Samannāgatāti samaṅgibhūtā. Ariyānaṃ
analyzed: kāya duccaritam itaresu pi samannāgatā ati samaṅgi bhūtāḥ

original: upavādakāti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā
analyzed: upavādakā ati buddha paccekabuddha sāvakānam ariyānam antamasaḥ gihi sotāpannānam pi anattha kāmā

original: hutvā antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā, akkosakā garahakāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: hutvā antima vatthunā vā guṇa paridhaṃsanena vā upavādakāḥ akkosakāḥ garahakā iti vuttam

original: hoti. Micchādiṭṭhikāti viparītadassanā. Micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānāti micchādiṭṭhivasena
analyzed: hoti micchādiṭṭhikā ati viparīta dassanā micchādiṭṭhi kamma samādānā ati micchādiṭṭhi vasena

original: samādinnanānāvidhakammā, yepi micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādāpenti.
analyzed: samādinna nānāvidha kammā ye pi micchādiṭṭhi mūlakesu kāya kamma ādīsu aññe pi samādāpenti

original: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇā.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā ati upādinna kkhandha pariccāgā param maraṇā ati tad anantaram abhinibbatta kkhandha ggahaṇā

original: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassūpacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cuticittato uddhaṃ.
analyzed: atha vā kāyassa bhedā ati jīvitindriya ssu upacchedā param maraṇā ati cuti cittataḥ

original: Apāyanti evamādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanameva. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā
analyzed: apāyanti evamādi sabbam niraya vevacanam eva nirayaḥ hi saggamokkha hetu bhūtā puñña sammatā

original: ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati,
analyzed: ayā apeta ttā sukhānam vā āyassa abhāvā apāyaḥ dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati

original: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammena nibbattā gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti tattha
analyzed: dosa bahula tāya vā duṭṭhena kammena nibbattā gatīti duggati vivasāḥ nipatanti tattha

original: dukkaṭṭakārinoti vinipāto, vinassantā vā ettha patanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti
analyzed: dukkaṭṭa kārinaḥ ti vinipātaḥ vinassantāḥ vai ettha patanti sambhijjamāna aṅga paccaṅgā ati

original: vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
analyzed: vinipātaḥ na atthi ettha assāda saññitaḥ ayaḥ ti nirayo

original: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā,
analyzed: atha vā apāya ggahaṇena tiracchānayonim dīpeti tiracchānayoni hi apāyaḥ sugatitaḥ apeta tā

original: na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayañca.
analyzed: na duggati mahesakkhānam nāga rāja ādīnam sambhavataḥ duggati ggahaṇena petti visayam ca

original: So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā, na tu vinipāto
analyzed: saḥ hi apāyaḥ ca iva duggati ca sugatitaḥ apeta ttā dukkhassa ca gati bhūta ttā na tu vinipātaḥ

original: asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ. So hi yathāvuttena atthena
analyzed: asura sadisam a vinipatita ttā vinipāta ggahaṇena asura kāyam saḥ hi yathāvuttena atthena

original: apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena
analyzed: apāyo ca iva duggati ca sabba samussayehi vinipatita ttā vinipāto ti vuccati niraya ggahaṇena

original: avīciādikamanekappakāraṃ nirayamevāti. Upapannāti upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti
analyzed: avīci ādikam aneka ppakāram nirayam eva ati upapannā ati upagatā tattha abhinibbattā ati

original: adhippāyo. Vuttavipariyāyena sukkapakkho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha sugatiggahaṇena
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ vutta vipariyāyena sukka pakkhaḥ veditabbaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ tattha sugati gahaṇena

original: manussāgatipi saṅgayhati, saggaggahaṇena devagatiyeva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati.
analyzed: saṅgayhati sagga ggahaṇena deva gatiyā iva tattha sundarā gatī iti sugati

original: Rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo. So sabbopi lujjanappalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti
analyzed: rūpa ādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggaḥ ti saggo saḥ sabbaḥ api lujjana ppalujjana aṭṭhena loko ti

analyzed: ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana sabba ākārena visuddhi magga saṃvaṇṇanāto gahetabbo

original: Tatiyādīni uttānatthāni.
analyzed: tatiya ādīni uttāna atthāni

original: Dutiyaāhuneyyasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dutiya āhuneyya sutta ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: anuttariya sutta vaṇṇanā

analyzed: aṭṭhame natthi etesam uttarāni visiṭṭhāni iti anuttarāni anuttarāni eva anuttariyāni

original: Esa nayo sesesupi. Sattavidhaariyadhanalābhoti sattavidhasaddhādilokuttaradhanalābho.
analyzed: esa nayo sesesu pi sattavidha ariya dhana lābho ti sattavidha saddhā ādi lokuttara dhana lābho

original: Sikkhāttayassa pūraṇanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ pūraṇaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: sikkhāttayassa pūraṇam ti adhisīla sikkhā ādīnam tissannam sikkhānam pūraṇam tattha

original: lokiyalokuttarāni kathitāni.
analyzed: lokiya lokuttarāni kathitāni

original: Anuttariyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: anuttariya sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 9. Anussatiṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: anussatiṭṭhāna sutta vaṇṇanā

original: hi pīti uppajjati, so taṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Upacārakammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: hi pīti uppajjati saḥ tam pītim khayataḥ vayataḥ paṭṭhapetvā arahattam pāpuṇāti upacāra kammaṭṭhānam

original: nāmetaṃ gihīnampi labbhati. Upacārakammaṭṭhānanti ca paccakkhato upacārajjhānāvahaṃ
analyzed: nāma etam gihīnam pi labbhati upacāra kammaṭṭhānan ti ca paccakkhataḥ upacāra jhāna āvaham

original: kammaṭṭhānaparamparāya sammasanaṃ yāva arahattā lokiyalokuttaravisesāvahaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna paramparāya sammasanam yāva arahattā lokiya lokuttara visesa āvaham esa nayo sabbattha

original: Anussatiṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: anussati ṭṭhāna sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 10. Mahānāmasuttavaṇṇanā
10. Dasame tasmiṃ samayeti buddhāguṇānussaraṇasamaye. Rāgapariyuṭṭhitanti rāgena
analyzed: dasame tasmin samaye iti buddha aguṇa anussaraṇa samaye rāga pariyuṭṭhitam ti rāgena

original: pariyuṭṭhitaṃ. Pariyuṭṭhānappattipi, rāgena vā saṃhitaṃ cittaṃ araññamiva corehi
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhitam rāgena vā saṃhitam cittam araññam iva corehi

original: tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ, tassa pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvatopi pariyuṭṭhitarāganti
analyzed: tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttam tassa pariyuṭṭhāna ṭṭhāna bhāvataḥ pi pariyuṭṭhita rāgam ti

original: attho. Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattaṃ dassento “uppajjamānena rāgena uṭṭhahitvā
analyzed: atthaḥ byañjanam pana an ādiyitvā attha mattam dassento uppajjamānena rāgena uṭṭhahitvā

original: gahita”nti āha. Ujukamevāti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ apanītattā cittassa ca anujubhāvakarānaṃ
analyzed: gahitanti āha ujukam eva ati pagā iva kāya vaṅka ādīnam apanīta ttā cittassa ca

original: mānādīnaṃ abhāvato, rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vā oṇatiuṇṇativirahato ujubhāvameva
analyzed: māna ādīnam abhāvataḥ rāga ādi pariyuṭṭhāna abhāvena vā oṇati uṇṇati virahataḥ uju bhāvam eva

original: gataṃ. Atha vā ujukamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa thinaṃ middhaṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamato
analyzed: gatam atha vā ujukam eva ati kammaṭṭhānassa thinam middham otiṇṇa tāya līn uddhacca vigamato

original: majjhimasamathanimittappaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ. Aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāyāti bhavajātiādīnaṃ
analyzed: majjhima samatha nimitta paṭipattiyā uju bhāvam eva gatam aṭṭhakatham nissāya ati bhava jāti ādīnam

original: padānaṃ atthaṃ nissāya. Atthavedanti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimāha. Dhammavedanti
analyzed: padānam attham nissāya attha vedanti vā hetu phalam paṭicca uppannam tuṭṭhim āha dhamma vedanti

original: hetuṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ. “Ārakattā araha”nti anussarantassa hi yadidaṃ bhagavato
analyzed: hetum paṭicca uppannam tuṭṭhim ārakattāḥ arahanti anussarantassa hi yat idam bhagavataḥ

original: kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu. Ñāpako cettha hetu adhippeto, na kārako sampāpako. Tatonena
analyzed: kilesehi so hetu ñāpako ca ittha hetu adhippeto na kārako sampāpako

original: ñāyamāno arahattattho phalaṃ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi hetuso phalavipāko veditabbo.
analyzed: ñāyamānaḥ arahat tatthaḥ phalam iminā nayena sesa padesu pi hetuso phala vipākaḥ veditabbo

original: Dhammānussatiādīsupi hi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇatādayo suppaṭipattiādayo ca tattha
analyzed: dhamma anussati ādīsu pi hi ādi majjha pariyosāna kalyāṇa tā ādayo suppaṭipatti ādayo ca tattha

original: tattha hetubhāvena niddiṭṭhāyeva. Dhammūpasaṃhitanti yathāvuttahetuphalasaṅkhātaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ.
analyzed: tattha hetu bhāvena niddiṭṭhāya iva dhamma upasaṃhitam ti yathā vutta hetu phala saṅkhāta guṇa upasaṃhitam

original: Mahānāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: mahānāma sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Āhuneyyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: “idaṃ tāva…pe… ettha vatthū”ti vuttaṃ.

original: tathā akammāsāni. Sīlassa taṇhādāsabyato mocanaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṃ, tasmā

original: na kīḷanāya. Na madāyāti na balamadamānamadapurisamadatthaṃ. Na maṇḍanāyāti na aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ

original: pīṇanabhāvatthaṃ. Na vibhūsanāyāti na tesaṃyeva sobhatthaṃ, chavisampattiatthanti
analyzed: pīṇana bhāva ttham na vibhūsanāya ati na tesam yeva sobha ttham chavi sampatti attham

original: attho. Imāni yathākkamaṃ mohadosasaṇṭhānavaṇṇarāgūpanissayappahānatthāni veditabbāni.
analyzed: imāni yathākkamam moha dosa saṇṭhāna vaṇṇa rāga upanissaya ppahāna atthāni veditabbāni

original: Purimaṃ vā dvayaṃ attano saṃkilesuppattinisedhanatthaṃ, itaraṃ parassapi. Cattāripi
analyzed: purimam vā dvayam attano saṃkilesa uppatti nisedhana attham itaram parassa pi

original: kāmasukhallikānuyogassa pahānatthaṃ vuttānīti veditabbāni. Kāyassāti rūpakāyassa.
analyzed: kāma sukhallikā anuyogassa pahāna attham vuttāni iti veditabbāni kāyassa ati rūpa kāyassa

original: Ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti pabandhaṭṭhitatthañceva pavattiyā avicchedanatthañca, cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitiyā yāpanāya ati pabandha ṭṭhita ttham ca iva pavattiyā a vicchedana ttham ca cira kāla ṭṭhita ttham

original: jīvitindriyassa pavattāpanatthaṃ. Vihiṃsūparatiyāti jighacchādukkhassa uparamatthaṃ.
analyzed: jīvita indriyassa pavattāpana tham vihiṃsu uparatiyā ati jighacchā dukkhassa uparama ttham

original: Brahmacariyānuggahāyāti sāsanamaggabrahmacariyānaṃ anuggaṇhanatthaṃ. Itīti evaṃ iminā
analyzed: brahmacariya anuggahāya ati sāsana magga brahmacariyānaṃ anuggaṇhana attham iti iti evam iminā

original: upāyena. Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ
analyzed: upāyena purāṇam ca vedanam paṭihaṅkhāmi iti purāṇam abhutta paccayā uppajjanaka vedanam

original: paṭihanissāmi. Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ
analyzed: paṭihanissāmi navam ca vedanam na uppādessāmi iti navam bhutta paccayā uppajjanaka vedanam

original: na uppādessāmi. Tassā hi anuppajjanatthameva āhāraṃ paribhuñjati. Ettha abhuttapaccayā
analyzed: na uppādessāmi tassāḥ hi an uppajjana attham eva āhāram paribhuñjati ettha a bhutta paccayā

original: uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāvuttajighacchānimittā vedanā. Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo
analyzed: uppajjanaka vedanā nāma yathāvutta jighacchā nimittā vedanā sā hi a bhuñjantassa bhiyyas

original: bhiyyopavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati, bhuttapaccayā anuppajjanakavedanāpi khudānimittāva
analyzed: bhiyyaḥ upavaḍḍhana vasena uppajjati bhutta paccayā anuppajjanaka vedanā api khudā nimittā ava

original: aṅgadāhasūlādivedanā appavattā. Sā hi bhuttapaccayā anuppannāva na uppajjissati.
analyzed: aṅga dāha sūla ādi vedanā appavattā sā hi bhutta paccayā anuppannā va na uppajjissati

original: Vihiṃsānimittatā cetāsaṃ vihiṃsāya viseso.
analyzed: vihiṃsā nimitta tā cetāsam vihiṃsāya visesaḥ

original: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati. “Yāpanāyā”ti
analyzed: yātrā ca me bhavissati iti yāpanā ca me catunnam iriyāpathānam bhavissati yāpanāya ati

original: iminā jīvitindriyayāpanā vuttā, idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti
analyzed: iminā jīvita indriya yāpanā vuttā idha catunnam iriyāpathānam aviccheda saṅkhātā yāpanā ati

original: ayametāsaṃ viseso. Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cāti ayuttapariyesanappaṭiggahaṇaparibhogaparivajjanena
analyzed: ayam etāsam visesaḥ anavajja tā ca phāsu vihāro ca ati ayutta pariyesana paṭiggahaṇa paribhoga parivajjanena

analyzed: anavajja tā parimita paribhogena phāsu vihāro asappāya aparimita bhojana paccayā arati tandī vijambhi tā viññu garaha ādi dosa abhāvena

original: vā anavajjatā. Sappāyaparimitabhojanapaccayā kāyabalasambhavena phāsuvihāro. Yāvadatthaṃ
analyzed: vā anavajja tā sappāya parimita bhojana paccayā kāya bala sambhavena phāsu vihāraḥ yāvadattham

original: udarāvadehakabhojanaparivajjanena vā seyyasukhapassasukhamiddhasukhādīnaṃ abhāvato
analyzed: udara avadehaka bhojana parivajjanena vā abhāvato

original: anavajjatā. Catupañcālopamattaūnabhojanena catuiriyāpathayogyatāpādanato phāsuvihāro. Vuttañhetaṃ –
analyzed: anavajja tā catu pañcāla upamatta ūna bhojanena catu iriyāpatha yogya tā āpādanato phāsu vihāraḥ vuttaṃ ha etam

original: “Cattāro pañca ālope, abhutvā udakaṃ pive;
analyzed: cattāraḥ pañca ālope a bhutvā udakam pive

original: Alaṃ phāsuvihārāya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno”ti. ;
analyzed: alam phāsu vihārāya pahitattassa bhikkhuno ti

original: Ettāvatā ca payojanapariggaho, majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hoti. Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti
analyzed: ettāvatā ca payojana pariggahaḥ majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hoti yātrā ca me bhavissati iti

original: payojanapariggahadīpanā. Yātrā hi naṃ āhārūpayogaṃ payojeti. Dhammikasukhāpariccāgahetuko
analyzed: payojana pariggaha dīpanā yātrā hi naṃ āhāra upayogam dhammika sukha a pariccāga hetukaḥ

original: phāsuvihāro majjhimā paṭipadā antadvayaparivajjanato.
analyzed: phāsu vihāraḥ majjhimā paṭipadā anta dvaya parivajjanato

original: Senāsananti senañca āsanañca. Yattha vihārādike seti nipajjati āsati nisīdati, taṃ
analyzed: senāsananti senam ca āsananti yattha vihāra ādike seti nipajjati āsati nisīdati tam

original: senāsanaṃ. Utuparissayavinodanappaṭisallānārāmatthanti utuyeva parisahanaṭṭhena parissayo
analyzed: senāsanam utu parissaya vinodana paṭisallāna ārāma tthanti utuyā iva parisahana ṭṭhena parissayo

original: sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro, tassa vinodanatthaṃ, anuppannassa anuppādanatthaṃ,
analyzed: sarīra ābādha citta vikkhepa karo tassa vinodana attham anuppannassa anuppādana ttham

original: uppannassa vūpasamanatthañcāti attho. Atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo

original: ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo, tassa vinodanatthañceva ekībhāvaphāsukatthañca.
analyzed: ca rāga dosa ādi paṭicchanna parissayo ca utu parissayo tassa vinodana ttham ca iva ekībhāva phāsuka ttham ca

original: Cīvarappaṭisevane hirīkopīnappaṭicchādanaṃ viya taṃ niyatapayojananti puna “yāvadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cīvara ppaṭisevane viya tat niyata payojanam ti puna yāvat eva ati vuttam

original: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāranti rogassa paccanīkappavattiyā gilānapaccayo, tato
analyzed: gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāranti rogassa paccanīka ppavattiyā gilāna paccayaḥ tatas

original: eva bhisakkassa anuññātavatthutāya bhesajjaṃ, jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro
analyzed: eva bhisakkassa anuññāta vatthu tāya bhesajjam jīvitassa parivāra sambhāra bhāvehi parikkhāraḥ

original: cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ. Veyyābādhikānanti veyyābādhato dhātukkhobhato

original: ca taṃnibbattakuṭṭhagaṇḍapīḷakādirogato uppannānaṃ. Vedanānanti dukkhavedanānaṃ.
analyzed: ca tad nibbatta kuṭṭha gaṇḍa pīḷaka ādi rogataḥ uppannānam vedanānam ti dukkha vedanānam

original: Abyābajjhaparamatāyāti niddukkhaparamabhāvāya. Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti,
analyzed: abyābajjha parama tāya ati niddukkha parama bhāvāya yāva tam dukkham sabbam pahīnam hoti

analyzed: tāva paṭisevāmi iti yojanā evam ettha saṅkhepena iva pāḷi vaṇṇanā veditabbā nava vedanuppādataḥ pi iti

original: viya navavedanuppādatopi veditabbā.
analyzed: viya nava vedanuppādataḥ pi veditabbā

analyzed: kammaṭṭhānikassa calanam nāma kammaṭṭhāna pariccāgaḥ ti āha calati kampati kammaṭṭhānam

original: vijahatī”ti. “Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”ti ettha ca lomasanāgattherassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: vijahati iti khamaḥ hoti sītassa uṇhassa ati ettha ca lomasa nāga therassa vatthu kathetabbam

original: Thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāya padhānaghare viharanto antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye
analyzed: thero kira cetiyapabbate piyaṅguguhāya padhāna ghare viharantaḥ antaraṭṭhake himapāta samaye

analyzed: lokantarika nirayam paccavekkhitvā kammaṭṭhānam a vijahantaḥ iva abbhokāse vītināmesi

original: Gimhasamaye ca pacchābhattaṃ bahicaṅkame kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto sedāpissa kacchehi
analyzed: gimha samaye ca pacchābhattam bahi caṅkame kammaṭṭhānam manasikaroto sedāpissa kacchehi

original: muccanti. Atha naṃ antevāsiko āha – “idha, bhante, nisīdatha, sītalo okāso”ti. Thero
analyzed: muccanti atha nam antevāsikaḥ āha idha bhante nisīdatha thero

original: “uṇhabhayenevamhi, āvuso, idha nisinno”ti avīcimahānirayaṃ paccavekkhitvā nisīdiyeva.
analyzed: āvuso idha nisinnaḥ ti avīci mahānirayam paccavekkhitvā nisīdiya iva

original: Uṇhanti cettha aggisantāpova veditabbo sūriyasantāpassa parato vuccamānattā. Sūriyasantāpavasena
analyzed: uṇhanti ca ittha aggi santāpaḥ uva veditabbo sūriya santāpassa paratas vuccamāna ttā sūriya santāpa vasena

original: panetaṃ vatthu vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pana itam vatthu vuttam

original: Yo ca dve tayo vāre bhattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā alabhamānopi anamatagge saṃsāre attano

analyzed: phuṭṭho ce pi tiracchāna upapattim paccavekkhitvā a vedhanto kammaṭṭhānam na vijahatiyā iva

original: khaṇḍacelavihāre kaṇikārapadhāniyaghare ariyavaṃsadhammaṃ suṇantaññeva ghoraviso
analyzed: khaṇḍa cela vihāre kaṇikāra padhāniya ghare ariya vaṃsa dhammam suṇantam eva ghora viso

original: pītiṃ uppādesi, saha pītuppādā visaṃ nivattitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. Thero tattheva cittekaggataṃ

original: Yo pana akkosavasena durutte duruttattāyeva ca durāgate api antimavatthusaññite vacanapathe
analyzed: yaḥ pana akkosa vasena durutte ca durāgate api antima vatthu saññite vacana pathe

analyzed: khamaḥ duruttānam durāgatānam vacana pathānam ti veditabbo thero kira paccaya santosa bhāvanā ārāma tāya

analyzed: mahāariya vaṃsa paṭipadam kathesi sabbaḥ mahāgāmaḥ āgacchati therassa mahā sakkāro

original: kathemī’ti sabbarattiṃ kolāhalaṃ karotī”tiādīhi akkosi. Ubhopi ca attano attano vihāraṃ

original: gacchantā gāvutamattaṃ ekapathena agamaṃsu. Sakalagāvutampi so taṃ akkosiyeva. Tato
analyzed: gacchantā gāvuta mattam eka pathena agamaṃsu sakala gāvutam pi saḥ tam tatas

original: kammaṭṭhānaviyogaṃ na passāmī”ti āha.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna viyogam na passāmi iti āha

original: Vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñāpetukāmānañca patho upāyoti āha “vacanameva vacanapatho”ti.
analyzed: vacanam eva āha vacanam eva vacana pathā iti

original: Asukhaṭṭhena vā tibbā. Yañhi na sukhaṃ, taṃ aniṭṭhaṃ tibbanti vuccati. Adhivāsakajātiko
analyzed: asukha ṭṭhena vā tibbāḥ yat hi na sukham tat aniṭṭham tibbanti vuccati adhivāsaka jātiko

original: hotīti yathāvuttavedanānaṃ adhivāsakasabhāvo hoti. Cittalapabbate padhāniyattherassa

original: – “āvuso, pabbajito nāma adhivāsanasīlo hotī”ti. So “sādhu, bhante”ti adhivāsetvā

original: niccalo sayi. Vāto nābhito yāva hadayaṃ phālesi. Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanto

original: muhuttena anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyi. Evaṃ sabbatthāti “uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato”tiādinā

original: Ahaṃ samaṇoti “ahaṃ samaṇo, kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā”ti evaṃ cintetvāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: aham samaṇaḥ iti aham samaṇaḥ kim mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā ati evam cintetvā iti adhippāyaḥ

original: bhante, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti ca “passasī”ti ca “āma, passāmī”ti ca paṭiññātāya
analyzed: bhante itthannāmam āpattim āpanno ti ca passasi iti ca āma passāmi iti ca paṭiññātāya

original: “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti karaṇaṃ, taṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. Saṅghādisese parivāsādiyācanā
analyzed: āyatim saṃvareyyāsi iti karaṇam tam paṭiññātakaraṇam nāma saṅgha ādisese parivāsa ādi yācanā

original: paṭiññā, parivāsādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma.
analyzed: paṭiññā parivāsa ādīnam dānam paṭiññātakaraṇam nāma

original: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna
analyzed: dve pakkha jātāḥ pana bhaṇḍana kārakāḥ bhikkhū bahum assāmaṇakam ajjhācāram caritvā puna

original: lajjidhamme uppanne “sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: lajji dhamme uppanne sace mayam imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññam kāressāma siyā api tam adhikaraṇam

original: kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā
analyzed: kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṃvatteyya ati aññam aññam āpattiyāḥ kārāpane dosam disvā yadā

original: bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena
analyzed: bhikkhū tiṇavatthāraka kammam karonti tadā āpatta adhikaraṇam sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena

original: ca sammati. Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ
analyzed: ca sammati tatra hi yattakāḥ hattha pāsu upagatāḥ na mā etam khamati iti evam diṭṭhā vikammam

original: akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti, niddampi okkantā honti,
analyzed: a katvā dukkaṭam kammam puna kātabbam kammanti na ukkoṭenti niddam pi okkantāḥ honti

original: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti. Evaṃ
analyzed: sabbesam ṭhapetvā thullavajjam ca gihi paṭisaṃyuttañca sabba āpattiyaḥ vuṭṭhahanti evam

original: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati.
analyzed: āpatta adhikaraṇam tīhi samathehi sammati

original: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva. Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni
analyzed: kicca adhikaraṇam ekena samathena sammati sammukha avinayena iva iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni

original: yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: yathānurūpam imehi sattahi samathehi tena vuttam uppanna uppannānam adhikaraṇānam

original: samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako”ti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
analyzed: samathāya vūpasamāya sammukha avinayaḥ dātabbaḥ ūpe tiṇava tthārako ti sesam sabbattha uttānam eva

original: Adhikaraṇasamathasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: adhikaraṇa samatha sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Vinayavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vinaya vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: iti manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttara nikāya aṭṭhakathāya

original: Sattakanipātavaṇṇanāya anuttānatthadīpanā samattā.
